products.title: PDGF (Platelet-Derived Growth Factor)
bulletPoints: Enhances collagen synthesis for stronger tissue regeneration.
Used in both chronic and acute wound treatments.

products.title: EGF (Epidermal Growth Factor)
bulletPoints: Encourages skin cell growth and repair.
Reduces scarring by promoting healthy skin regeneration.
Supports faster wound closure and healing.

products.title: Ionic Silver Solution Stream
bulletPoints: Antimicrobial properties help prevent wound infections.
Supports fibroblast function for faster healing.
Ideal for use in both chronic and acute wounds.

products.title: Colloidal Silver Spray
bulletPoints: Effective in killing harmful bacteria at the wound site.
Supports the natural healing process by boosting fibroblast function.
Helps in managing both minor and severe wounds.
